history.proof: intros. unfold Included in H. intros y H2. sauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros T F G H x H1.
intros T' F G H x H1.

exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall x : Ensemble T, In F x -> In G x" on hypothesis of type "In (FamilyIntersection G) y".

original: intros T F G H x H1. unfold Included in H. intros y H2. apply H in H2. apply FamilyIntersection_sind with (t:=x). - intros S H3 z H4. apply H in H4. apply H3 in H4. apply H4. - apply H1. apply H2.
